mapper.sql: ID, PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, RANKING, PROPORTION, OFFER_PRICE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, CREATER_ID, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
order by ${orderByClause}

select PRODUCT.ID id,PRODUCT.NAME productName,resultInfo.RESULTS_NUMBER productNum,resultInfo.MY_OFFER_MONEY myOfferMoney,resultInfo.REMARK remark FROM T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT product,T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO resultInfo where RESULTINFO.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId} AND resultInfo.SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId} AND PRODUCT.ID=RESULTINFO.PRODUCT_ID
select COUNT(RANKING)as RANKING from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT where PROJECT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY RANKING,SUPPLIER_ID,PROJECT_ID HAVING COUNT(RANKING)>2

SELECT SUM(OFFER_PRICE) COUNTOFFER_PRICE,SUM(TOTAL_AMOUNT) COUNTTOTAL_AMOUNT,SUM(RESULT_COUNT) COUNTRESULT_COUNT,SUPPLIER_ID,RANKING,STATUS FROM T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{supplierId} GROUP BY SUPPLIER_ID,RANKING,STATUS ORDER BY RANKING
SELECT * from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER smsSupplier,T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT projectResult WHERE PROJECTRESULT.SUPPLIER_ID=SMSSUPPLIER.id and PROJECTRESULT.PRODUCT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT (ID, PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, RANKING, PROPORTION, OFFER_PRICE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, CREATER_ID, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
ID,
PRODUCT_ID,
PROJECT_ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
RANKING,
PROPORTION,
OFFER_PRICE,
TOTAL_AMOUNT,
CREATE_TIME,
STATUS,
CREATER_ID,
REMARK,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,

mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT SUPPLIER_ID) from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT where PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS=1
mapper.update:
update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANKING = #{record.ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{record.proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFER_PRICE = #{record.offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{record.totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANKING = #{record.ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPORTION = #{record.proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_PRICE = #{record.offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{record.totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFER_PRICE = #{offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFER_PRICE = #{offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{productId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFER_PRICE = #{offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT set PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_PRICE = #{offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
